DOC.brief_summary: There is a decrease in the amount of blood components used during cardiac surgery in the last four years. As the hemovigilance team of the investigators' Hospital the investigators want to find out the causes and effects of this decrease.
DOC.brief_title: Decreased Consumption of Blood Components During Cardiac Surgery Procedures: Causes and Effects.
DOC.criteria: patient underwent cardiac surgery between 2010 and 2014 in UZ Leuven patient without cardiac surgery
